column5: Does anyone have any information on Carroll Lake? If so please resond or shoot me an email. LASSH

lassh - i've been looking for feedback on this site for carrol lake for quite a few years and have seen nothing. the best bet might be to contact the outfitter (showalters or kenora) and see if you can get some references from them. it seems like a hugh lake/river system and only two cabins on the lake (i think) and you may need a manitoba license also. please post anything you find as we're considering this lake also. thanks, phish
